property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before drawing cards at the beginning of your turn, do not draw any. While committed, any of your attacks get +2 damage and any of your attacks that deal damage is immediately placed into your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard X momentum: Discard X cards from your card pool. E: Your {Void} attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: While this card is in your card pool, your control checks get +2 and your attacks get +2 damage. Only playable if this is the first Form you play this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you discard a card from your card pool during your Combat Phase, your next attack this turn gets +1 damage.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, remove 3 cards from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If All copies of this card deal damage, discard this card and All copies of it from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Do not clear this card during your End Phase. This card remains in your card pool until your next End Phase. While this card is in your card pool, your attacks get +1 damage and your opponent may not play ranged attacks.

property.name: CardText
property.value: X equals the number of cards in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you completely block with this attack, do not clear this card during the End Phase. While this card is in your card pool, your attacks get +1 damage and any attack that deals damage is immediately added to your momentum.

property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). EDiscard 2 momentum: Switch this card's speed and damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, discard 1 non-attack card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may only block ranged attacks. After you block with this card, leave this card in your card pool until your next End Phase. While this card is in your card pool, your control checks get +1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X momentum: This attack gets 'Multiple: X'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack with 'Multiple: 2' or higher gets +2 damage.

property.value: R Commit: After you add an attack to your momentum, take 1 card from the top of your deck and add it to your momentum.

property.value: E Commit 2 foundations, discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the difficulty of the discarded card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If you block this attack, play any ranged attack in your hand as a reversal as normal. R Commit: After you add a card to or discard a card from any player's momentum, that player commits 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: Before you play a card's stun ability, that card gets +1 to its stun rating. R: When your opponent would commit foundations for a stun effect and cannot, they lose 1 vitality for each foundation they would have committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Make a control check. Add X cards from the top of any players deck to their momentum or discard X cards from any players momentum. X equals the control check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After failing to play an attack as a reversal, you may attempt to play another reversal from your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). You may not play this card if there is a ranged attack in your card pool.Charlie E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards All cards in their momentum.

property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. E: If you add this card to your momentum, add 1 card from the top of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this card is added to your momentum, add it face up. E: Your attack played as a reversal gets 'Stun: 1'. Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is blocked, you must pass as your next form this turn.

property.name: CardText

property.value: After you block with this card, your opponent may not play powerful abilities for the rest of the turn.

property.name: CardText

Hawk R Commit, add the top card of your deck to your card pool face down: After your opponent plays an attack, for the rest of the turn you do not need to block before playing a reversal and you may play any attack as a reversal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After a reversal gets a damage bonus, it gets +1 damage. R: Once per turn, any time an ability on one of your opponent's cards could be played, you may play that ability as though it were printed on your character card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before your opponent makes a control check to block an attack, if the attack will deal more damage than its printed damage, the control check for that block gets -1. E: Any attack that shares a resource symbol with your character gets +1 damage for each symbol it shares with your character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before your opponent attempts a control check for an attack with a printed difficulty 4 or less, that check gets -2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Your high attacks gets +2 damage for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Search your deck for an {Earth} action card with a printed difficulty of 6, reveal it and place it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 4 momentum: Take All cards that have been removed from the game and add them to their owner's discard pile.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Attach this card to your character card. While attached, your character becomes an exact copy of your opponent's character, including All vital statistics, current hand size, current maximum vitality, resource symbols, and abilities. Your character retains All resource symbols on your character card(s). At the end of every Ready Phase, you must discard 1 momentum or remove this card from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, your opponent gets -1 to their control checks while this card is in your card pool.

property.value: E: This attack gets +2 damage and -2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After this card is successfully played as a reversal against a ranged attack, it gets 'Multiple: 2'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, you may play another copy of this attack from your hand into your card pool, following All restrictions and paying All costs (no control check necessary). The copy gets -1 damage and -1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Choose one attack in your opponent's discard pile. Place one card from your hand into your card pool face down. The card in your card pool becomes an exact copy of the chosen card. Play that card as normal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you play a reversal, search your opponent's discard pile for a reversal and play it instead. When you clear your card pool, that card goes to your opponent's discard pile.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack that shares three or more symbols with your character card gets +1 damage.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: Choose one resource symbol. This attack gains that resource symbol.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Choose one action in your opponent's discard pile. Place one card from your hand into your card pool face down. The card in your card pool becomes an exact copy of the chosen card. Play that card as normal.

property.name: CardText
